CustomField.formula: OR( Announcement__r.ReadOnlyOwner__c , IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(BusinessRole__c, 'Program Reviewer'), ISPICKVAL(BusinessRole__c, 'Fiscal Reviewer'), ISPICKVAL(BusinessRole__c, 'Executive Reviewer') ), HideInitiateReview__c, False ) )
CustomField.label: Hide Announcement Edit(Obsolete)
